title: What the **** are these ranks
body:
Legit 3 games in a  row i get people that endlessly feed or go Riven mid and cry the whole game how useless every one is and how everyone sucks and calls us shit all game 3 GAMES! plus 2 games i was in my promos!!! hopefully this gets fixed in the preseason and everyone gets put down to the rank they bloody belong

Fyi. never this salty but srsly losing 2 promos cause you get people that feed 6 kills by 10 mins and know nothing about the lane they  picked...

replies.body: lol Riven mid is a thing, but most Riven mains in low elo don't know and understand how to use it, it's like giving a low elo player Galio top with the perfect enemy team comp for it, and the guys still wouldn't know how to use him

I think Riot gives you shitters in promotional series, so that you have to prove that you are worthy or promotion, just my 2 cents worth.

> [{quoted}](name=Baileyballs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wdpERif1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-30T00:07:16.410+0000)
>
> poor you, try having to put up with that for 90% of your games :)

Yep silver 5 is a cesspit of noobs this season, and if you're a support main, good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Cakemeisting,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wdpERif1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-30T03:59:42.318+0000)
>

I'm a support main and i get my team as many kills and peel etc. but just they are too fed or too far ahead we can't even slightly vs them. :( but it's fine. at least next season they said there are 2 seperate q one for solo/duo and one for flex which is basically this seasons q
poor you, try having to put up with that for 90% of your games :)
